name: state into
description:
This is 'state into', a new video game from Outhouse Media. It's not just the architecture of this game, it's the way it's built: it's a game about video game design and the creation of video games: inspired by and built on the lessons of games like Grand Theft Auto and Tekken.
"I'm constantly looking for ways to share my passion with others, whether it's through promoting and touring, or writing or promoting myself, or collaborating with others. My own personal projects have been inspired by games, but I've always veered into the world of video games specifically and the art side of things as well. What started as a hobby for me, I think has been a true testament to a passion for art. There's a lot of extraordinary artists in the world, and it's amazing how easy it is to learn from them. Not every single one of them is published in a book, it's not just certain games that are well-known, but these artists have been pioneers that have been recording their work using film. It's amazing how much everyone can learn from someone who's so passionate about a subject." I'd always thought that people who looked at games had to be different from people who didn't, and certainly the direction of these videos and Outhouse's style of game design make it clear that's not the case.
